directions.step:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees. On a greased baking sheet, roll pizza into a 9 x 13 rectangle. Brush pesto over entire surface. Roll the dough lengthwise to form a log. Brush surface with olive oil and bake for 30 minutes. Slice on the diagonal to show spiral pattern. Serve. Recipe By :FROM MY GARDEN SHOW #F5540
